scripts.predev: concurrently  "cd authserver && yarn" "cd backend && yarn"  "cd socketio && yarn"
scripts.dev: concurrently  "cd authserver && yarn run dev" "cd backend && yarn run dev"  "cd socketio && yarn run dev"
scripts.prestart: concurrently  "cd authserver && yarn add all" "cd backend && yarn add all"  "cd socketio && yarn add all"
scripts.start: concurrently  "cd authserver && yarn run start" "cd backend && yarn run start"  "cd socketio && yarn run start"
